QuestData.Title: One Little Whisper
QuestData.Description:
Here be da deal, $n. To get Mueh'zala talkin', we gotta feed him a teeny bit a da life essence of everybody in dis room.
Why ya be lookin' at me like dat? When has ol' Bwonsamdi ever let ya down?
Me gonna use da mojo ya got to pull da truth outta him while he be feedin'.
Oh, uh, just two more tings. First, I need ya to be ringin' an invitation to a special... friend.
Den I be giving ya more of me mojo powder. Use it during da ritual if any o' me followers be gettin' too weak.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ring the gong to summon the special guest, then use mojo powder in the ritual to fuel Mueh'zala.
QuestData.RewardText:
Dere be one loa o' death, $n. And it be ol' Bwonsamdi.
Ya best not forget dat.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Bwonsamdi to begin the ritual
